channel.title: Online Dating
channel.description:
Thoughts/Opinions on it? Do you think it ever actually works out? Is it just a big scandal? I have heard that the owners of some of these online dating sites make bank from running the site(s).
I don't was just curious is all what others on the internet thought about this type of stuff.

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I don’t see a problem with it. Like people are saying though, it is getting over advertised. Most of the sites are in it for only the money, but still serves a great purpose: to find love.

item.title: Online Dating
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

For some reason every post I see from you makes me feel like you’re some sort of stalker or sexual predator

On topic, as long as it’s just to meet the person initially I’d say it’s okay, but strictly online/long distance relationships would be weird, and definitely not for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Online Dating
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:454011”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=556884.msg4076220#msg4076220 date=1344871188]

Well, I don’t have a problem with people who are online dating like on RSPS and what not, stuff like eHarmony is a bit over-advertised (as said before). I wouldn’t do something like that myself though, just not my type. If someone finds someone else (their one love) then by all means go for it, otherwise I’m not affected by it.

Err, dating on a private server? That’s a little sad.
[/quote]^ going to have to agree with this. I guess it is POSSIBLE but I highly doubt it.[/quote]
Well, assuming the title of this topic, “Online Dating”, I was being a little broad on it. Let’s face it, it’s happened and it’s a bit possible, it’s not just RSPS either.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Err, dating on a private server? That’s a little sad.[/quote]^ going to have to agree with this. I guess it is POSSIBLE but I highly doubt it.

item.title: Online Dating
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I personally don’t recommend it, due to the amount of scandals, and people that have perfectly good reason to not being able to find a relationship irl, I mean:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sP4NMoJcFd4[/youtube]

Although, there is plenty of normal people that use these sites, so I’m sure one would be able to find somebody eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: Online Dating
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

These online dating sites to help you meet people aren’t too bad, but they are over advertised… As for strictly online dating, like mista pnut says, its too easy to get away with lying and becoming someone you’re not

Read full topic

item.title: Online Dating
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

While I’m tired of ads for dating, I can’t speak negatively about it. My sister found one on a dating site, and they are going to be married in a year.

Read full topic

item.title: Online Dating
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I think that more often then not, online dating is full of lies. I mean, how would your partner be able to tell if you’re lying, so why not make yourself look better? That’s just my opinion, no hard feelings towards anyone that does this, it’s your life and who am I to judge?

Read full topic
